content: HOUSTON  Aug 3 Targa Resources on Wednesday said three liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) export cargoes were canceled out of its Galena Park terminal near Houston  Texas in the past two months amid fluctuating Asian demand and collapsing prices.

title: UPDATE 1-Targa Resources: 3 LPG cargoes canceled in past two months

content: NEW YORK  Feb 16 Top U.S. investors differed in their exposure to battered energy companies in the fourth quarter  with Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway taking a sizable stake in Kinder Morgan and Leon Cooperman's Omega Advisors scaling back from the sector.
name: Targa Resources Inc
title: Top U.S. investors' bets on energy shares diverge in Q4

content: Nov 3 Natural gas pipeline company Targa Resources Corp (TRC) said it would acquire the common units of Targa Resources Partners LP (TRP) it did not already own  in a deal that valued TRP at about $6.67 billion.
name: Targa Resources Inc
title: Targa Resources to buy Targa Resources Partners

content: TOKYO  Feb 24 Japan's Astomos Energy Corp said on Tuesday it had signed a three-year contract to buy U.S. shale-derived liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) from Texas-based Targa Resources Corp.
name: Targa Resources Inc
title: Japan's Astomos Energy to buy U.S. LPG from Targa Resources
